info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 04 at 1:59PM CDT until April 04 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN WINNEBAGO...NORTHWESTERN MCHENRY AND NORTHERN BOONE COUNTIES... At 159 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sharon, or near Harvard, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Beloit, Loves Park, Machesney Park, Roscoe, Harvard, South Beloit, Rockton, Poplar Grove, Candlewick Lake, Sharon, Capron, Hebron, Timberlane, Chemung, Caledonia and Harrison. This includes... Rock Cut State Park, Rockford Rivets Baseball, and Rockford Speedway. Including the following interstate... I-90 between mile markers 0 and 13. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
